body:

> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/19717?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [8382067...47f7d40](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/19717?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

Could you also add a test that hits the `Series` constructor directly?

```python
result = Series('a', index=[0, 1],
                dtype=pd.api.types.CategoricalDtype(['a', 'b'], ordered=True)
```

That way if the implementation changes in the future, we at least have that covered.
